title: Multimedia Learning Preference-Based Design Workshop for Continuing Engineering Education (CEE)

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Continuing education program for engineers analyzing learners' multimedia preferences and cognitive styles to design personalized curricula

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world cases by applying core mathematical concepts necessary for engineering problem-solving
Learners can diagnose their multimedia learning preferences (text/visual materials/videos) and incorporate them into learning strategies
Learners can select and evaluate optimal learning strategies based on peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
